categories.name: Getting Started
categories.description: Basic information about using the chat application

topics.title: How to start a conversation
topics.content: Simply type your message in the input field and press Enter or click the send button.

topics.title: Available features
topics.content: This chat supports text conversations, file uploads, and various AI tools.

categories.name: AI Capabilities
categories.description: What the AI assistant can help with

topics.title: Code generation
topics.content: The AI can generate, explain, and debug code in multiple programming languages.

topics.title: Document creation
topics.content: Create and edit documents, essays, and other written content.
